homepage.title: Welcome to MBX Community
homepage.subtitle: Join the Minebox community and enhance your journey with Player Profiles, Interactive Maps, the Equipment Manager, and Community Projects.
homepage.features.playerProfile.title: Player Profile
homepage.features.playerProfile.descript: Customize your profile with stats, achievements, and more to showcase your Minebox journey.
homepage.features.interactiveMap.title: Interactive Map
homepage.features.interactiveMap.descrip: Explore the Minebox world with detailed interactive maps showing locations and resources.
homepage.features.communityProjects.desc: Discover and explore community-driven mods, tools, and websites for Minebox.

homepage.features.museum.title: Museum
homepage.features.museum.description: Explore your museum without being connected, but don't forget to enable third-parties API access in-game.
